description: Written in 1913, The Poison Belt was the second story that Sir Arthur Conan Doyle wrote about Professor Challenger. It takes place rather strangely, given that it follows The Lost World - a story set in the jungle, in a room in Challenger's house. An interesting plot ensues when Challenger sends a telegram calling three companions back home from The Lost World. With Challenger’s correct prediction that the world is in great peril this story follows the groups survival and the aftermath of such a seemingly catastrophic event. To have access to this classic masterpiece download our ebook today!
